availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elija Frank Nuttall (Henry County, Kentucky, attorney and judge of the Eighth Judicial District)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, attorney and judge of the Eighth Judicial District. Kentucky native. Married to Jane A. Nuttall. Father of Eliza Nuttall, and Martha Nuttall. Attorney in Henry County in 1850 and 1860. Judge of the Eighth Judicial District of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1859 to 1861. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry, District 1, p. 366B.

“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1860,” in 1861 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1861), 413.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 303-308.
